name: Dodgeball Versus
description: Dodgeball Versus is an arcade-y dodgeball game where you can take on friends in a competitive ranked 1v1 match filled with fast paced-strategical gameplay!! If that's not enough, players can also try to survive and onslaught of enemies, striking back harder and harder each wave. You can also sit back and change your avatar, and unlock items to add to your own gym!!
